summary: Frontend UI Enrichments Phase 3.1 Complete - All 5 features PASSED. Dashboard cockpit with calendar banners + delivery/lead stats + top clients 7d + problem clients + low quota + blocked stock all working. Clients page enriched with phone/channels/auto_send/delivery_days/deliverable/delivery_count/view_deliveries. Deliveries page enriched with client phone/auto_send OFF indicator/last_error column/client_id URL filter. Delivery detail enriched with client panel. Settings page enriched with status banners.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Dashboard cockpit: Calendar banners for ZR7/MDL showing 'delivery_day_disabled:samedi' - WORKING
✅ Dashboard cockpit: 6 delivery stats cards (Pending CSV:0, Ready:473, Sent:160, Failed:0, Billable:159, Rejected:1) - WORKING
✅ Dashboard cockpit: 5 lead blocked stock cards (No Open Orders:1831, Hold Source:82, Pending Config:80, Routed:473, Livre:159) - WORKING
✅ Dashboard cockpit: Top Clients 7d section with billable/rejected/failed counts (151b, 1r, etc.) - WORKING
✅ Dashboard cockpit: Problem Clients section showing 5 non-deliverable clients with reasons - WORKING
✅ Dashboard cockpit: Low Quota section showing commandes near quota limit - WORKING
✅ Dashboard cockpit: Blocked Stock breakdown by entity/produit - WORKING
✅ Clients page: Phone (Tel) column with phone numbers - WORKING
✅ Clients page: Canaux column with Mail/Globe icons for delivery channels - WORKING
✅ Clients page: Auto Send ON/OFF toggle displayed - WORKING
✅ Clients page: Delivery days grid (L M Me J V S D) with visual indicators - WORKING
✅ Clients page: Livrable column with checkmark/alert + deliverable reason - WORKING
✅ Clients page: Deliveries count column - WORKING
✅ Clients page: View Deliveries button navigating to /admin/deliveries?client_id=XXX - WORKING
✅ Deliveries page: Client phone shown next to client name - WORKING
✅ Deliveries page: Auto_send OFF indicator (PauseCircle icon) for ready_to_send with auto_send disabled - WORKING
✅ Deliveries page: Last Error column present - WORKING
✅ Deliveries page: client_id filter preserved from URL params, filters panel auto-opens - WORKING
✅ Deliveries page: Clear filters resets URL (removes client_id) - WORKING
✅ Delivery detail: Client panel with phone/email/auto_send/delivery days calendar - WORKING
✅ Delivery detail: 'Voir toutes les deliveries de ce client' link present - WORKING
✅ Settings page: Simulation mode status banner at top (ON with email) - WORKING
✅ Settings page: ZR7 calendar status banner showing delivery_day_disabled:samedi - WORKING
✅ Settings page: MDL calendar status banner showing delivery_day_disabled:samedi - WORKING
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 3.1 UI enrichments tested and working. Dashboard cockpit shows comprehensive view with calendar banners (both showing Saturday OFF), delivery stats (6 cards), lead blocked stock (5 cards), top clients 7d with billable/rejected/failed counts, problem clients (5 non-deliverable), low quota commandes, and blocked stock breakdown. Clients page enriched with all new columns. Deliveries page supports URL params for client_id filtering. Delivery detail has full client panel. Settings page has status banners at top. Current app state: 633 deliveries, 8 clients (3 ZR7 + 5 MDL), simulation mode ON.
